misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the golf course, hails from the esteemed Helsingin Golfklubi. Beyond the greens, Olli maintains a side hustle as a professional model.
Olli's imposing stature and rumored wrestling prowess command respect. Few players dare to challenge him, making him a force to be reckoned with both on and off the course.

With seven past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Olli is a seasoned competitor. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his participation in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 marks his eighth venture in this esteemed tournament. Olli remains an active and determined participant in Hector events.
